scripts.apigen: rm -rf ./tmp/papi && git clone git@github.com:wp-papi/papi.git ./tmp/papi && cd ./tmp/papi && git checkout 3.x && apigen generate --groups=none -s ./src -d ../../public/apigen --tree --deprecated --template-config ../../tmp/apigen/src/config.neon
scripts.apigen-theme: rm -rf ./tmp/apigen && git clone git@github.com:wp-papi/apigen-theme.git ./tmp/apigen && cd ./tmp/apigen && composer install && cd ../..
scripts.deploy: rm -rf .deploy_git public && hexo generate && npm run apigen-theme && npm run apigen && npm run static && npm run cleanup && hexo deploy
scripts.static: cp -R static/* public/ && cp LICENSE public/ && mv public/apigen/ public/docs/
